New Records: CJ McCollum tied a career-high with 50 points
New Orleans Pelicans defeated Washington Wizards 132-120
Key Match Events: The Pelicans started the third quarter off on a 14-2 run
The Wizards were held to 23 points in the fourth quarter
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum mentioned the importance of the win for the fans and the team's pride
Willie Green emphasized the need for better performance in future games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was significant for CJ McCollum's performance and the team's effort despite a tough season
The win was crucial for the Pelicans' confidence and standings
